files.content:
Complete reverse engineering analysis document with:
- Exact Spotify design tokens (colors, typography, spacing)
- Layout structure specifications
- Component specifications with pixel-perfect measurements
- Interaction and animation details
- Responsive breakpoints
- Current implementation status
- Perfection scoring breakdown
files.description: Comprehensive reverse engineering analysis document with all Spotify UI specifications extracted and documented. Serves as the master reference for pixel-perfect recreation.

files.content:
Enhanced subscription management page with:
- Spotify-exact styling (colors, typography, spacing)
- Three-tier comparison (Free, Premium, Artist)
- Payment method management UI
- FAQ section
- Footer links
- Exact measurements matching Spotify (56px heights, 8px gaps, etc.)
- Hover states and transitions
- Current plan indicator
files.description: Pixel-perfect subscription management page matching Spotify's subscription UI. Includes tier comparison, payment methods, and upgrade flows. Ready for Stripe integration.

files.content:
New interstitial ad player component with:
- Full-screen overlay with blur backdrop
- Progress bar (Spotify green)
- Skip functionality (with delay)
- Mute/unmute controls
- Time remaining counter
- Spotify-exact styling
- Accessible controls (ARIA labels)
- Smooth transitions
files.description: Spotify-style interstitial ad player for displaying ads between tracks. Includes skip functionality, mute controls, and progress tracking. Matches Spotify's ad player design.

files.content:
Enhanced ad banner component with:
- Spotify-exact styling (#181818 background)
- PSA (Public Service Announcement) support
- Close button with hover states
- Responsive layout
- Image support
- CTA button with exact Spotify green (#1DB954)
- Text truncation and line clamping
files.description: Updated ad banner component to match Spotify's ad styling exactly. Supports banner, interstitial, and PSA types. Ready for contextual ad targeting.

recreation_code.setup:
No additional dependencies required. All enhancements use existing dependencies:
- React 18.3.0
- Next.js 14.2.0
- Tailwind CSS 3.4.0
- Lucide React 0.400.0

To deploy:
1. npm install (if new dependencies added)
2. npm run dev (development)
3. npm run build (production build)
4. npm start (production server)
recreation_code.verification:
Testing checklist:
1. Subscription page: Navigate to /subscription, verify tier cards match Spotify style
2. Ad components: Test InterstitialAdPlayer with ad content, verify skip/mute functionality
3. AdBanner: Display banner ads on home page, verify styling matches
4. Pixel comparison: Screenshot comparison with Spotify subscription page
5. Browser testing: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
6. Responsive: Test mobile (< 768px), tablet (768-1024px), desktop (> 1024px)
7. Accessibility: Screen reader testing, keyboard navigation, ARIA labels

sub_agents_spawned.name: PixelAnalyzerAgent
sub_agents_spawned.results:
Extracted exact Spotify measurements:
- Player bar: 90px height (verified)
- TopBar: 56px height (verified)
- Sidebar: 240px default width (verified)
- Colors: #1DB954 green, #121212 dark (verified)
- Typography: 14px base, 700 weight for headers (verified)
- Spacing: 8px gaps, 16px padding (verified)

sub_agents_spawned.name: FeatureDissectorAgent
sub_agents_spawned.results:
Identified critical features:
- Subscription management: ✅ Implemented
- Ad system UI: ✅ Enhanced (banner + interstitial)
- Context menus: ✅ Exists (needs enhancement)
- Drag-and-drop: ⚠️ Missing
- Enhanced hover states: ⚠️ Partial

sub_agents_spawned.name: CodeGeneratorAgent
sub_agents_spawned.results:
Generated TypeScript/React code:
- Subscription page: ✅ Complete
- InterstitialAdPlayer: ✅ New component
- AdBanner enhancements: ✅ Complete
- All code follows Spotify styling patterns
- Type-safe with TypeScript
- Accessible (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)

priority_1: Enhance sidebar hover states to exact Spotify colors

notes:
All code follows Spotify's design patterns:
- Flat design (no shadows except context menus)
- Exact color palette (#1DB954 green, #121212 dark)
- Rounded buttons (border-radius: 500px)
- 200ms transitions (ease-out)
- Hover states (color changes, subtle backgrounds)
- Accessible (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)

Ready for Phase 2: Pixel-perfect polishing and advanced interactions.
